metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3575 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer overflow was found in openjpeg in color.c:379:42 insycc420_to_rgb when decompressing a crafted .j2k file. An attacker coulduse this to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the applicationcompiled against openjpeg.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-08-23').
insighttoolkit4 package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-08-23').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-08-23').
blender package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-08-23').
texmaker package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-08-23').
